data.text:
One day, in the afternoon. I was heading to the 
trainers' offices when I heard a familiar voice.
data.processed:
󠁿One day, in the afternoon. I was heading to the 
󠁿trainers' offices when I heard a familiar voice.

data.text:
――You over there. 
――A notice for you.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
󠁿――You over there. 
󠁿――A notice for you.

data.text:
Hiii……!? A notice…… 
p-punishment……!?
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
󠁿Hiii……!? A notice…… 
󠁿p-punishment……!?

data.text:
――There's something ――I need to hand this person. 
…………Documents. ――from the committee.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
󠁿――There's something ――I need to hand this person. 
󠁿…………Documents. ――from the committee.

data.text:
Committee――……Ah! It was a requisition form 
for club activities!? Um…… I-I'll hold on to it……!
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
󠁿Committee――……Ah! It was a requisition form 
󠁿for club activities!? Um…… I-I'll hold on to it……!

data.text: ――Case 1, resolved.
data.name: Symboli Kris S

choices.text: In the middle of an errand?

data.processed: 󠁿――Case 1, resolved.

data.text: ……Student council work. ――Rudolf is busy. So―― she asked me.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿……Student council work. ――Rudolf is busy. So―― she asked me.

data.text:
Seems like she noticed how busy the student council president 
was and offered to help. She was as dutiful as ever.
data.processed:
󠁿Seems like she noticed how busy the student council president 
󠁿was and offered to help. She was as dutiful as ever.

data.text: I want to become my mentor's results―― is what I thought.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿I want to become my mentor's results―― is what I thought.

data.text:
In this country, Japan―― to become an Uma Musume 
that could cause a revolution. ――That's my mission.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
󠁿In this country, Japan―― to become an Uma Musume 
󠁿that could cause a revolution. ――That's my mission.

data.text:
It was repayment of gratitude to the Symboli family―― I could 
respect that. ……But, this would probably be tough for her.
data.processed:
󠁿It was repayment of gratitude to the Symboli family―― I could 
󠁿respect that. ……But, this would probably be tough for her.

data.text:
Ahahaa, thenー that's when my dadーー whoa!? 
S-s-s-s-sorry, were we being noisy!?
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
󠁿Ahahaa, thenー that's when my dadーー whoa!? 
󠁿S-s-s-s-sorry, were we being noisy!?

data.text: No―― documents.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿No―― documents.

data.text:
From the committee!? T-that's a relief, I thought you were mad―― 
……Ah…… A-anyways! Thank you very much!
data.name: Uma Musume C
data.processed:
󠁿From the committee!? T-that's a relief, I thought you were mad―― 
󠁿……Ah…… A-anyways! Thank you very much!

data.text: And so, the distribution of documents went smoothly, but――
data.processed: 󠁿And so, the distribution of documents went smoothly, but――

data.text:
Whoa whoa! ……Huu…… I guess carrying 3 buckets is too much. 
But I need to hurry――
data.name: Uma Musume D
data.processed:
󠁿Whoa whoa! ……Huu…… I guess carrying 3 buckets is too much. 
󠁿But I need to hurry――

data.text: ――Wait. You over there.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿――Wait. You over there.

data.text: Hyaa!? Ah……!
data.name: Uma Musume D
data.processed: 󠁿Hyaa!? Ah……!

data.text: (Slam! ――Splash!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Slam! ――Splash!)

data.text: ……The documents didn't get wet.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿……The documents didn't get wet.

data.text:
I-……I-I-I-I'm soooo sorry!!! 
……T-towel, a towel! I'll go get a towelーー!!!
data.name: Uma Musume D

choices.text: For now, why don't you go change?

data.processed:
󠁿I-……I-I-I-I'm soooo sorry!!! 
󠁿……T-towel, a towel! I'll go get a towelーー!!!

data.text: ――――Yeah.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿――――Yeah.

data.text: …………I didn't hand over the documents.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿…………I didn't hand over the documents.

data.text:
Looks like she was more worried about the documents 
than herself. Once again―― I couldn't help but 
see her as a sincere but awkward girl.
data.processed:
󠁿Looks like she was more worried about the documents 
󠁿than herself. Once again―― I couldn't help but 
󠁿see her as a sincere but awkward girl.

data.text: Mission Accomplished――……I appreciate your cooperation.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿Mission Accomplished――……I appreciate your cooperation.

data.text:
Certainly, we were able to complete all our tasks safely. 
However――
data.processed:
󠁿Certainly, we were able to complete all our tasks safely. 
󠁿However――

data.text:
――？ 
…………What do you mean?
data.name: Symboli Kris S

choices.text: That there were a lot of misunderstandings……
choices.processed: <size=35>That there were a lot of misunderstandings……</size>

data.processed:
󠁿――？ 
󠁿…………What do you mean?

data.text: ……――But we finished our tasks.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿……――But we finished our tasks.

data.text:
――That there was a misunderstanding…… and causing 
a scene in the hallway―― I'm reflecting on it. 
……But――other than that――no problems.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
󠁿――That there was a misunderstanding…… and causing 
󠁿a scene in the hallway―― I'm reflecting on it. 
󠁿……But――other than that――no problems.

data.text: ――I'll go report.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: 󠁿――I'll go report.

data.text:
Even if she was misunderstood, she didn't seem to care. 
That made me a little worried though――
data.processed:
󠁿Even if she was misunderstood, she didn't seem to care. 
󠁿That made me a little worried though――
